Paul Clavin bụ onye sayensị Frenchi na Mahadum Aix-Marseille, na-arụ ọrụ na ngalaba nke ọkụ na statistical mechanics
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Institute for Research on Nonequilibrium Phenomena (IRPHE).
Clavin jere ozi  dika onyeisi oche nke mekanik nke ana ahụ anya na Institut Universitaire de France site na 1993 ruo 2004. Ọ natara Ya.B

Zeldovich Gold Medal site na The Combustion Institute na 2014 na onye otu The Combussion Institute. E mere ogbako akpọrọ Out-of-Equilibrium Dynamics na 2012 iji sọpụrụ ụbọchị ọmụmụ Clavin nke afọ 70. Ọ bụ onye natara onyinye Grand Prix site na French Academy of Sciences na 1998 ma nata onyinye Plumey site na Société Française de Physique na 1988
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya na ebe ana agụmakwụkwọ maka frenchi n'afọ 1997.
